topic: Absurde bids to complete stunning international double for Willie Mullins in Melbourne Cup

ideas.title: Dharma & Derby
ideas.premise: A Buddhist monk in full robes, inexplicably betting heavily on 'Absurde' with a wink and a slightly guilty smile, whispering 'May the odds be ever in your favour' from The Hunger Games.
ideas.why_funny: Juxtaposes solemnity with gambling, plus the Hunger Games reference is ironic.

ideas.title: Qantas Red Tail Rejection
ideas.premise: A horse, resembling Absurde, is trying to board a Qantas flight to LA, only to be told 'Sorry, we only accept *economy* passengers' by a dingo wearing a Qantas uniform.
ideas.why_funny: Pokes fun at the expensive Qantas flights and horse travel impracticality.

ideas.title: The Absurde Queue
ideas.premise: A long, snaking queue of horses (all sizes and breeds) outside a Centrelink office in Melbourne, labelled 'For Absurde's Prize Money'
ideas.why_funny: Relates horse racing to welfare, playing on Australian humour.

ideas.title: Frocked Up Felons
ideas.premise: A group of nuns and the disgraced monk, all wearing ridiculously over-the-top Derby Day fascinators, are cheering on 'Absurde' from the Flemington mounting yard.
ideas.why_funny: Combines two scandalous Melbourne stories into one absurd image.

ideas.title: Monaghan's Miscalculation
ideas.premise: Michelle Monaghan, dressed in her stunning Derby Day outfit, tries to ride Absurde in the race, only to realize she is far too short.
ideas.why_funny: Plays on celebrity involvement and the impracticality of celebrity jockeys.

headlines.summary: Michelle Monaghan is putting her leg on display! The 49-year-old The White Lotus star stepped out for the 2025 Derby Day held at Flemington Racecourse
